answers.answer: I got my results back the same day. Some people get theirs back two to four weeks later
I waited about a week then got it in the mail. I passed thank god but it said I was becoming anemic so I got some iron pills.

My midwife called me the next day with results because I failed and had to set up the three hour test. They called me the next day after that one too, to set up my first appointment at the diabetes clinic. If there is an abnormal result from anything I hear about it right away - generally they don't call me with normal results and I hear about it at my next appointment.

question: i heard it takes a week, but I'm anxious to know my results!
title: How long does it take the glucose test results to come back?
